channel.title: Help Fast this is overloading my server :S
channel.description:
How do i make it so if people click to fast it logs them off?
The second i turn on my server my player count goes to 40(dam me for making a good sever : )
Any way I can make it so they don't lag it lol?
also what does this mean in the server window
[code]Invalid waypoint in walking queue![/code]
And what does it mean when it repeats like this when attacking an NPC
[code]Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456[/code]
This Freezes the server for a sec
And Some times when I try to start server up I normally have to close it out and open it 10 times before even I can Connect
I also want to know why blood runes getting banked/unbanked crash the server
and why is it sometimes someone will get disconnected and it will say every one is logged in when there not and wont let any one log in?
Also how do I fix this: [code] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12444) at client.process(client.java:12428) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:46) Cheezscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player chad[/code]
I just mainly need a way to stop the lag on my server [br][size=1]Posted at: July 26, 2006, 10:28:40 AM[/size][hr]Somone help please cause the one with the npc Id Over loads the server and freezes it

item.title: Help Fast this is overloading my server :S

@corbett14 wrote:

how do i make my own sever???

item.title: Help Fast this is overloading my server :S
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

Well, to fix your 40 player problem search this in playerhandler.java : public static final int maxPlayers = and after that, change the number to what you want max players to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Fast this is overloading my server :S
item.dc:creator: @dj_anster dj anster
item.description:
@dj_anster wrote:

[quote=“anfernee, post:1, topic:6301”]How do i make it so if people click to fast it logs them off?

The second i turn on my server my player count goes to 40(dam me for making a good sever : )

Any way I can make it so they don’t lag it lol?

also what does this mean in the server window

Invalid waypoint in walking queue!

And what does it mean when it repeats like this when attacking an NPC

Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456 Npc id =456

This Freezes the server for a sec

And Some times when I try to start server up I normally have to close it out and open it 10 times before even I can Connect

I also want to know why blood runes getting banked/unbanked crash the server

and why is it sometimes someone will get disconnected and it will say every one is logged in when there not and wont let any one log in?

Also how do I fix this:

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12444) at client.process(client.java:12428) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:46) Cheezscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player chad

I just mainly need a way to stop the lag on my server
